name: Portals: Escape the Infinity
description:
Take the challenge, think smart, explore, and solve enigmas to complete all 50 levels!

FEATURES:

- Brain-teasing puzzles to solve
- Point-and-click game mechanics
- Minimal and clean design
- Intuitive gameplay
- Hints for when you get stuck

HOW TO PLAY:

The objective of Portals: Escape The Infinity is simple, yet highly engaging.
Using your excellent brain, you must activate each of the 50 portals and progress to the next level by teletransportation.
For you to do that, search for hidden objects, solve tricky puzzles, and think out of the box

Experiencing difficulty in solving the puzzles or have ideas to improve the game? Get in touch on the developer' social media or website for support and feedback
